Editing Legend and Label Text

Note: This topic applies to charting window in the Windows client only.

The labels used in the legend are also used as labels for bars on a bar chart, labels along the axis, etc. When you edit the legend, this action also changes the text in the labels.

To change the text used in the legend and the labels:

  1. Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar. Then select Data Editor from the menu. The menu option becomes checked, and the Data Editor appears in the chart area.

  2. Double-click any legend entry or label to access Edit mode.

  3. Change the text, as required.

  4. Use the arrow keys or double-click to move to other entries and change them.

  5. Click outside the Data Editor to exit Edit mode.

  6. Click the Tools button again, and clear Data Editor from the menu. The chart reappears with the new legend and label text.

To delete text used in the legend:

  1. Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar. Then select Data Editor from the menu. The Data Editor appears in the chart area and the menu option becomes checked.

  2. Double-click the text for any legend entry to access edit mode.

  3. Delete the text, as required

  4. Use the arrow keys to move to or double click other entries and change them.

  5. Click outside the Data Editor to exit edit mode.

  6. Click the Tools again, and clear Data Editor from the menu again. The chart reappears with the new legend text.
